meanings.definition: A sudden change or shift in direction or opinion.
meanings.sent1: The volta in his decision surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The sudden volta in her attitude left us all puzzled.
meanings.sent3: The volta in his taste for music was quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her volta in political views was like a bolt from the blue.
meanings.sent5: The volta in the plot twist made the movie unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The battery had a high volta to power the device.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the volta before connecting the wires.
meanings.sent3: The volta in the circuit made the light bulb flicker.
meanings.sent4: The volta in the power supply caused a surge in the system.
meanings.sent5: The volta in the experiment measured the electrical charge accurately.

meanings.sent1: She wrote a beautiful volta for her poetry class.
meanings.sent2: The volta in his sonnet added depth to the poem.
meanings.sent3: The volta in her writing style impressed the professor.
meanings.sent4: His volta in composing sonnets showcased his talent.
meanings.sent5: The volta in the Italian sonnet structure highlighted the theme effectively.
